name: Segments
description:
This game was made as part of the  GeoJam 2022.

The theme was "Pick a side". 

In this game, you need to pick different sides & segments and merge them to form the required shape. The game ends when there are no moves to make!

Rules:

  • Same tiles will not merge.
  • For any tile, if its neighboring tile on the direction of movement shares at least one common segment, that tile won't move.

Modes:

  • The Regular box mode: Here join four segments to form a box ◻
  • The Box+Cross mode: Here join four segments to form a box ◻, or two segments to form a cross ✖, or six segments to form a "cross in the box" ⛝

Controls & Keys :

  • Use Arrow Keys / WASD keys to move and merge tiles.  Those are the only controls!!
  • Press "R" to restart / press on "Game Over Card" / tap on  "Title (SEGMENTS)" to restart the game.
  • Press "P" / tap on "Score Card"  to pause the game. 
  • Tap on "Best" to switch between light and dark themes.

Lemme know your high scores in the comments!!

Background Music:

Schumann Fast Zu Ernst by DL Sounds | https://www.dl-sounds.com/
